name: MeditationRetreat

”Alexa, open meditation retreat”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meditation retreat
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Meditation Retreat is the alexa skill that allows you to perform guided meditations whenever you want. 
With more than 10 sessions of meditations with different voices and background sounds lasting 10, 20 and 30 minutes, this skill will help the body and mind relax.

With the Pro Features you will access to :

• meditations with different professional voices
• differents background sounds perfect for meditation sessions 
• no production limits.
• Continually updated meditation pathways 
• Access to all available durations of meditations

We are waiting for your review to improve and offer the best meditation session guidade.

Enjoy Listening!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
